mapper.sql: id, start_date, end_date, user_id, device_name, create_time, device_id, state, manager, share_amount, last_back_time, rental, rental_type, owner
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from e_orders
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into e_orders (id, start_date, end_date, user_id, device_name, create_time, device_id, state, manager, share_amount, last_back_time, rental, rental_type, owner) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{manager,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shareAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lastBackTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rental,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rentalType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into e_orders
id,
start_date,
end_date,
user_id,
device_name,
create_time,
device_id,
state,
manager,
share_amount,
last_back_time,
rental,
rental_type,

mapper.update:
update e_orders
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_date = #{record.startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_date = #{record.endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
user_id = #{record.userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_name = #{record.deviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
device_id = #{record.deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{record.state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
manager = #{record.manager,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
share_amount = #{record.shareAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
last_back_time = #{record.lastBackTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
rental = #{record.rental,jdbcType=INTEGER},
rental_type = #{record.rentalType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
owner = #{record.owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update e_orders set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_date = #{record.startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_date = #{record.endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_id = #{record.userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_name = #{record.deviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, device_id = #{record.deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{record.state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, manager = #{record.manager,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, share_amount = #{record.shareAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, last_back_time = #{record.lastBackTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rental = #{record.rental,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rental_type = #{record.rentalType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, owner = #{record.owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update e_orders
start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_name = #{deviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
manager = #{manager,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
share_amount = #{shareAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
last_back_time = #{lastBackTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
rental = #{rental,jdbcType=INTEGER},
rental_type = #{rentalType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
owner = #{owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update e_orders set start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_name = #{deviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, manager = #{manager,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, share_amount = #{shareAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, last_back_time = #{lastBackTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rental = #{rental,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rental_type = #{rentalType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, owner = #{owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT u.nick_name,u.profile_image,c.changeCount,u.name FROM e_user u,(SELECT COUNT(*) changeCount,manager FROM e_scane_log WHERE DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),"%Y-%m-%d")=DATE_FORMAT(start_date,"%Y-%m-%d") AND opration=6 AND manager IS NOT NULL GROUP BY manager) c WHERE u.id=c.manager ORDER BY c.changeCount DESC;

SELECT u.nick_name,u.profile_image,c.changeCount,u.name FROM e_user u,(SELECT COUNT(*) changeCount,manager FROM e_scane_log WHERE DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),"%U")=DATE_FORMAT(start_date,"%U") AND opration=6 AND manager IS NOT NULL GROUP BY manager) c WHERE u.id=c.manager ORDER BY c.changeCount DESC;

SELECT u.nick_name,u.profile_image,c.changeCount, u.name FROM e_user u,(SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(*),0) changeCount,manager FROM e_scane_log WHERE DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),"%M")=DATE_FORMAT(start_date,"%M") AND opration=6 AND manager IS NOT NULL GROUP BY manager) c WHERE u.id=c.manager ORDER BY c.changeCount DESC;
